text: The word Sunnah (Arabic: سَنَةٌ) is an Arabic word meaning "tradition" or "way." For Muslims, Sunnah means "the way of the prophet". Sunnites try to follow his words, actions and teachings. Muslim scholars learn about the Sunnah by studying thousands of stories about Muhammad, his family, and his first followers. These stories are called Hadith. == Related pages == * Sunni Islam * Quranism Category:Islamic terminology Category:Arabic words and phrases
title: Sunnah
